title: Eureka Powerful Upright Vacuum Cleaner for Carpet and Floor, Household Upright Vacuum Cleaner for Home Pets, Bagless Lightweight Upright Vacuum, MaxSwivel Pro NEU350 with Pet Tool, Yellow
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

Eureka MaxSwivel Pro Upright Vacuum Cleaner is the perfect addition to your apartment essentials! Equipped with swivel steering technology and LED headlight, this vacuum effortlessly navigates around your home, cleaning every nook and cranny including those darkest corners under furniture.

Our upgraded dual cyclone technology provides powerful suction that easily picks up even the most stubborn dirt and debris from carpets and floors, while the five height adjustments can adapt to various surfaces, making it perfect for use in dorm rooms and apartments.

With various onboard accessories, this pet vacuum cleaner can easily clean pet hair, upholstery, car curtains, ceilings, door frames, and other hard-to-reach areas. Don't settle for less, invest in our best vacuum cleaner and experience the ultimate cleaning experience!
If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886.
Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks.
Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.
